channel.title: golang on Travis' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Travis' Blog

item.title: Golang
item.description: Tutorial - https://golang.google.cn/doc/tutorial/getting-started.html - https://golang.google.cn/doc/tutorial/create-module.html - https://golang.google.cn/doc/tutorial/workspaces.html - https://golang.google.cn/doc/tutorial/web-service-gin.html - https://golang.google.cn/doc/tutorial/generics.html - https://golang.google.cn/doc/tutorial/fuzz.html - https://golang.google.cn/doc/articles/wiki/ - https://golang.google.cn/doc/code.html - https://golang.google.cn/tour/ - https://golang.google.cn/cmd/go/ - https://golang.google.cn/solutions/#use-cases - https://youtu.be/YS4e4q9oBaU Install rm -rf /usr/local/go && tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.18.1.linux-amd64.tar.gz Import local module go mod edit -replace example.com/greetings=../greetings go mod tidy go list go list -f '{{.Target}}' go workspace go work init go work use -r go work edit go work sync Config go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.
